title: Crawl
body: Commissioned by [Powerhoof](https://www.powerhoof.com/crawl/) for merch illustrations for their game Crawl, a “dungeon crawler where your friends control the monsters”!  Available on the [Samurai Punk](https://store.samuraipunk.com/collections/powerhoof-collection/products/ghidraak-t-shirt) webstore.
